metadata.title: MediMind Track | Intelligent Medical Device Tracking
metadata.description: Real-time visibility for mobile medical equipment with battery-free tracking, minimal infrastructure, and a pilot-first approach.

hero.headline: Stop searching. Start knowing.
hero.subheadline: Real-time visibility for mobile medical equipment — with battery-free tracking, minimal infrastructure, and a pilot-first approach that proves value before you scale.
hero.description: Your staff shouldn't spend their shift hunting for IV pumps. MediMind Track shows you where equipment is, how it's being used, and what you actually need — without adding maintenance burden to your team.

trustBar.headline: Trusted by clinical engineering teams who need visibility without complexity

problem.headline: Optimize equipment operations
problem.description: Improve staff efficiency and reduce costs with MediMind Track's real-time location, battery-free tracking, and intelligent utilization insights.

feature1.title: Real-time location
feature1.description: Know where every IV pump, wheelchair, and ventilator is right now — not where it was scanned last week.

feature2.title: Battery-free tracking
feature2.description: Tags harvest energy from ambient light. No batteries to replace, no dead tags, no maintenance burden.

feature3.title: Minimal infrastructure
feature3.description: 2-4 gateways cover your entire facility. Deploy in weeks, not months, with minimal IT coordination.

feature4.title: Utilization analytics
feature4.description: See which assets sit idle, identify hoarding patterns, and right-size your inventory based on actual usage data.

solution.headline: See Everything. Maintain Nothing.
solution.description: MediMind Track gives you real-time visibility into your mobile equipment fleet — where it is, how it's moving, and whether you have the right amount.

feature1.title: Real-Time Location
feature1.description: Know where equipment is right now — not where it was scanned last week. Search by device type, department, or specific asset.

feature2.title: Battery-Free Tracking
feature2.description: Our tags harvest energy from ambient light. No battery replacement programs. No dead tags creating blind spots in your data.

feature3.title: Minimal Infrastructure
feature3.description: Typically 1-2 powered gateways per floor, depending on your layout. Not dozens of access points requiring IT coordination.

feature4.title: Utilization Intelligence
feature4.description: Go beyond location. See which assets sit idle, identify hoarding patterns, and right-size your inventory based on actual usage.

howItWorks.headline: Deployed in Weeks, Not Months
howItWorks.description: No complex ceiling infrastructure. No IT firewall battles. No six-month implementation timelines.

step1.title: Tag
step1.description: Attach lightweight, battery-free labels to your equipment. Takes seconds per device. No charging, no pairing, no maintenance schedule.

step2.title: Connect
step2.description: Install a small number of powered gateways — typically 1-2 per floor. They communicate with tags using long-range, low-power signals.

step3.title: Track
step3.description: Access equipment locations through a clean web dashboard or mobile app. Search naturally: "Where are the available IV pumps on 3 North?"

howItWorks.timeline: Typical pilot deployment: 2-4 weeks from kickoff to live data

section1.headline: Zero Battery Maintenance. Ever.
section1.description: Our tags use photovoltaic cells powered by ambient indoor light, storing energy in carbon-based supercapacitors. No lithium batteries to replace. No maintenance schedules to manage. No dead tags creating blind spots.
section1.highlight: The only carbon-based supercapacitor solution — recyclable and sustainable.

section2.headline: 1-2 Gateways Per Floor. Entire Hospital Coverage.
section2.description: Long-range communication means fewer access points, simpler installation, and less IT coordination. Cover more area with less infrastructure.
section2.highlight: Compare to traditional RTLS: 10-20+ access points per floor.

section3.headline: Ask Questions. Get Answers.
section3.description: Our AI-powered mobile assistant understands natural language. Ask "Where's the nearest portable ultrasound?" and get instant answers. No complex menus or search filters.
section3.highlight: Built for clinical workflows, not IT departments.

impact.headline: Outcomes That Matter
impact.description: Documented results from healthcare facilities using real-time asset tracking technology.
impact.source: Based on documented outcomes from Southeastern Regional Medical Center's RTLS implementation. Individual results vary by facility size, equipment mix, and operational context.

compliance.headline: Healthcare-Grade Security & Compliance
compliance.description: Built from the ground up to meet the stringent requirements of healthcare environments. Your data security is our priority.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliant
hipaa.description: Full compliance with Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act requirements for protected health information.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit. Your location data is always protected.

audit.title: Complete Audit Trails
audit.description: Comprehensive logging of all system access and data changes for regulatory compliance and internal review.

soc2.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc2.description: Independent verification of our security controls, availability, and confidentiality practices.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.description: Full compliance with European data protection regulations including data minimization and right to erasure.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Integration
enterprise.description: SSO, LDAP/AD integration, and REST APIs for seamless connection with your existing systems.

certifications.title: Trusted by Healthcare IT
certifications.subtitle: Meeting the standards your compliance team requires
